headline: How Earnings Growth and Trust Recognition at Southern (SO) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Southern Company reported higher net income and revenue for the third quarter and nine months ended September 30, 2025, and reaffirmed its regular quarterly dividend of US$0.74 per share, payable December 8, 2025. The company was also recognized as the highest-ranked U.S. energy firm on Newsweek's World's Most Trustworthy Companies 2025 list, highlighting its reputation and focus on clean, reliable energy. We'll explore how the combination of earnings growth and enhanced trustworthiness...

headline: Southern inks 7 GW of large load contracts, eyes 50 GW more
summary: The company saw sales growth across all customer classes in the third quarter. Data center usage up was up 17% year over year, according to a Thursday earnings presentation.

headline: Southern Co (SO) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Financial Performance Amid Economic Growth
summary: Southern Co (SO) surpasses earnings expectations with robust customer growth and strategic investments, despite weather challenges and future financial commitments.
